text: Giuseppe Caldarola (9 April 1946 - 21 September 2020) was an Italian journalist and politician. He was a Deputy from 2001 to 2008. He was born in Bari, Italy. He was a member of the Democrats of the Left. Caldarola died in Rome on 21 September 2020 at the age of 74. ==References== Category:1946 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Italian journalists Category:Politicians from Apulia Category:People from Bari
title: Giuseppe Caldarola
